title: RANKED GAME DIDNT REGISTER
body:
Just played a game of ranked with my mate and the enemy team had a DC about 5 minutes into the game. we smacked them and they did an early /ff but the bloody game didnt register and i didnt get my lp. can riot fix this and either give me my lp or fix me up with a solid amount of RP 

Yours truly 
parker lad

replies.body:
You don't get LP for remakes, that's the whole point of remakes. The only LP changes when a remake occurs is for the dced/afk player, who experiences a loss. For everyone else the game effectively does not exist. If a remake occurs it's not a real or fair win, so it would be silly to grant LP for that.

If you mean an early surrender as in at 15 mins, then give it a little and see, sometimes match history just takes a while to update.
just to clarify it was ff15 since the dc was at 5 min mark, after the possibility of remake
Hmm, has it appeared in your match history yet? If not, I'd recommend submitting a ticket. Since it's an account specific thing there isn't much else we can do here.
im not the guy that posted this board lol
Woopsie sorry didn't realise you weren't the OP :P. He said about and remakes happen at 3 so I wasn't going to discount the possibility.
